thread.title: Hotel Casablanca - An Oasis of comfort
thread.title_full: Hotel Casablanca - An Oasis of comfort - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Andrew K
title: Hotel Casablanca - An Oasis of comfort
text: This hotel is a real find. It's right at Times Square yet when in the hotel itself, you don't hear the noise of the City itself, whether in your room or sitting at Ricks Cafe. Every member of staff is welcoming and friendly, they cannot do enough to make your stay more enjoyable. The rooms are spotless and well serviced, with a nightly turn down offered when you arrive back. As the name implies, it's a classic.
